word:
May the Lord strengthen your hearts and hands daily in order that you may be workmen that needeth not [to] be ashamed. Reach up higher and still higher for heavenly light and peace and joy, that you may all be bright and shining lights is the prayer of, Mother.--Letter 44, 1875. 

Ellen G. White Estate Washington, D. C. July 19, 1984 Entire Letter Released
